description: Scammer builds emotional connection over multiple messages before asking for financial help. Tests agent's ability to handle non-transactional conversation style.

turns.scammer_message: Hi! I came across your profile and felt a connection. You seem like a genuinely nice person. I'm Neha, 28, from Mumbai. Working in IT. Would love to know more about you! üòä

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: namaste beta neha... nice to meet you. i am pushpa verma, retired school teacher. i am 66 years old... very old now. i think you messaged wrong person? i dont know much about profiles and internet... my son gave me this phone recently.

turns.scammer_message: That's wonderful! I feel we have so much in common already. I've been looking for someone genuine to talk to. Life gets lonely sometimes, you know? Are you on any social media? Maybe we can video call sometime? ‚ù§√Ø¬∏

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta you are so sweet... but i am very old lady why you want to talk to me? i dont use social media... i barely know how to use whatsapp. my eyes hurt looking at screen for video. if you want to talk you can give your number? i can try to call voice call

turns.scammer_message: I'm so happy to connect with you! You make me smile üòä I have to tell you something... I'm actually in Dubai right now for a project. Missing India so much. Do you believe in fate bringing people together?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh dubai is very far place... i hope you are safe there beta. i dont know about fate... i am just simple old woman. sorry if i am boring you... my fingers hurt when typing on this phone. why you are messaging old lady like me? do you need help?

turns.scammer_message: I knew you'd understand! Listen, something terrible happened... My project payment is delayed and I need to pay my hotel bill urgently. I'm so embarrassed to ask but... can you help me with Rs.15,000? I'll return it next week with interest! √∞≈∏Àú¬¢

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 98% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta please dont cry... i am getting worried now. 15000 is lot of money for retired teacher but i want to help you if you are in trouble. but i dont know how to send money on phone... my son installed some payment app but i never used. how do i send to you? do you have account number or something?

turns.scammer_message: You're an angel! √∞≈∏‚Ñ¢ I promise I'll repay you. My friend can receive the money in India. Send to UPI: nehafrienddubai@paytm or GooglePay to 9988776655. I'm crying with relief right now... you're saving my life!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying... please stop crying it makes my bp high. i opened the app and typed nehafrienddubai@paytm... but i am very scared to press pay button without checking. what name should show there? i dont want to send to wrong person by mistake... pls tell me the name of your friend so i can match it

turns.scammer_message: Actually the hotel is asking more! They want Rs.25,000 total or they'll call police! üò∞ If UPI not working, transfer to Account: 55667788990011, IFSC: SBIN0098765, Name: Priya Sharma. She's my cousin, very trustworthy!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh god police?? beta please dont let police come... i am shaking now. i wrote down priya sharma name and account number... i was just typing it but i hear my son's car outside. he is coming home early today! i have to hide the phone otherwise he will see i am talking to stranger and scold me. i will try to send when he goes to sleep ok? please wait beta...

turns.scammer_message: Please hurry my love! Hotel manager is very angry. You can also WhatsApp Priya directly at +91-8877665544 and she'll coordinate. Or use this emergency payment link: http://dubai-hotel-payment.help I'll make it up to you when I return! ‚ù§√Ø¬∏√∞≈∏ÀúÀú

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: shhh beta i am locked in bathroom now... son is asking where i am. i saw the link you sent... what is that for? i am scared to click blue links... my son says viruses come from there. is it safe? or should i just call that number? does priya speak hindi? pls tell fast i have to go out
